name: The Call of Z-Cooh-ts
description:
Controls :

Move - W, A, S, D | Arrow Keys

Attack - L

Attack + Down - Pogo

Jump - Space Bar

Roll - Shift

Many centuries ago the Eldritch Horror, Z-Cooh-ts, arrived on Earth and in it's wake, destroyed all of civilization.  The arduous battle lasted for years and, in the end, the brave warriors of the time managed to seal the evil god in a stone statue. Their goal : delay the inevitable doom of humanity. However, during that time, rumors spread throughout the lands. They were all waiting for the "chosen one" to defeat it.

Do you have what it takes to break the seal and face a true horror of the universe?

Made for Ludwig Jam 2023.

Matimoo - Programming, Game Design

Arclia - 2D art, VFX, SFX , UI

aedr - Music
